blur_detection.description: The receipt text is clearly legible with well-defined characters and minimal blur.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text sharpness is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt exhibits good contrast between dark text and light background.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No enhancement needed as current contrast level is suitable for text extraction.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflections are visible on the receipt.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action required as image is free from glare issues.

water_stains.description: No visible water damage or staining affecting the receipt content.
water_stains.recommendation: No remediation needed as document is free from water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: Minor crease lines visible on the receipt but not significantly affecting text legibility.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed as existing creases don't impair OCR accuracy.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt appears to be fully captured within the image frame with all edges visible.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No recapture needed as all receipt content is included in the image.

missing_sections.description: All standard receipt sections are present including merchant info, items, prices, and totals.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as receipt structure is complete and intact.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows or other obstructions blocking the receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: No recapture needed as image is free from obstructions.
